hanzi-su-wiki:
悶

Значения

Мучаться, терзаться

Мнемоника

Сердце 心 не на месте (за воротами 門), чувствовать себя «не в своей тарелке».

Варианты

闷
purpleculture_pinyin:
mēn
stuffy; shut indoors; to smother; to cover tightly
душно; закрыть в помещении; задушить; плотно прикрыть

mèn
bored; depressed; melancholy; sealed; airtight; tightly closed
скучающий; депрессивный; меланхолия; запечатанный; герметичный; плотно закрытый
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 闷)
Pictophonetic: 門 indicates the sound; 心 (heart) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
悶熱 [ mēn rè ]: sultry; sultriness; hot and stuffy; stifling hot
悶聲悶氣 [ mēn shēng mēn qì ]: muffled
悶聲不響 [ mēn shēng bù xiǎng ]: to keep silent
悶嘴葫蘆 [ mēn zuǐ hú lu ]: silent person (idiom)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿵ Surround from above
    • 門 [ mén ] gate, door, entrance, opening
    • 心 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
heisig_chinese_memo: The gates suddenly slam shut trapping you and your heart beats a bit because it's stuffy and cramped making you nervous. &nbsp
Ru_trainchinese:
mēn: (прил/глаг) душный; (диал., о звуке) глухой; закрывать наглухо; запирать(ся) в четырех стенах; молчать
mèn: (прил/сущ) скучающий, унылый, тоскливый; плотно закрытый; скука, уныние, тоска
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a heart (心) under a gate (門) would be in agony
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: On Valentine's Day guys like to take their dates to parties at big mansions where you have to drive in through the gates.  The problem is there are too many people at these parties and it gets so stuffy inside.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " heart " to " door " sound, the original meaning is worry and anger. "Shuowen": "Suddenly. From the heart, the door sounds." "Yi·Qian": "It is not easy to fall into the world, not to become famous, to escape from the world without boring, not to see the truth without boring.

" Song " also refers to being bored . "The Strange Situation I've Witnessed in Twenty Years" Chapter 71: "Xuefang is not here at this time, and is suffocated all day long. There is nowhere to tell and no negotiation."

" Stuffy " also means the unhappiness caused by the lack of air flow. "Suwen‧ Wind Theory": "The wind is good, and the number changes. The law is open to radiate cold, and the closed is hot and stuffy."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " heart " and " door ", the original meaning is worry and anger.
humanum_full_description:
從「心」，「門」聲，本義為煩憂、憤懣。《說文》：「懣也。从心，門聲。」《易‧乾》：「不易乎世，不成乎名，遯世無悶，不見是而無悶。」

　　「悶」也指憋悶。《二十年目睹之怪現狀》第71回：「雪舫此時卻不來了，終日悶着一肚子氣，沒處好告訴，沒有好商量。」

　　「悶」還表示因氣不通暢而引起的不快之感。《素問‧風論》：「風者，善行而數變，腠理開則灑然寒，閉則熱而悶。」
humanum_short_description: 從「心」，「門」聲，本義為煩憂、憤懣。

HSK 6: 悶,闷
(Simplified: 闷)
Pictophonetic: 門 indicates the sound; 心 (heart) conveys the meaning.
  • Chinese Definition:
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿵ Surround from above
    • 門 [ mén ] gate, door, entrance, opening
    • 心 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
①因空氣不流通而引起的感覺：悶氣。悶熱。
②密閉，使不透氣：茶剛沏上，悶會兒再喝。
③不吭聲，不聲張：他只是悶頭苦幹。
悶熱 [ mēn rè ]: sultry; sultriness; hot and stuffy; stifling hot
悶聲悶氣 [ mēn shēng mēn qì ]: muffled
悶聲不響 [ mēn shēng bù xiǎng ]: to keep silent
悶嘴葫蘆 [ mēn zuǐ hú lu ]: silent person (idiom)
①心煩，不舒暢：愁悶。沉悶。鬱悶。悶懣。悶悶不樂。
②密閉，不透氣：悶子車。
(Simplified: 闷)
Pictophonetic: 門 indicates the sound; 心 (heart) conveys the meaning.
  • Chinese Definition:

HSK: 6
Kanshudo mnemonic:a heart (心) under a gate (門) would be in agony
Chinese: The gates suddenly slam shut trapping you and your heart beats a bit because it's stuffy and cramped making you nervous.  
Meaning: stuffy
Hanzi: 闷
Story: On Valentine's Day guys like to take their dates to parties at big mansions where you have to drive in through the gates. The problem is there are too many people at these parties and it gets so stuffy inside.
Kind: traditional

從「 心 」，「 門 」聲，本義為煩憂、憤懣。《說文》：「懣也。从心，門聲。」《易‧乾》：「不易乎世，不成乎名，遯世無悶，不見是而無悶。」 「 悶 」也指憋悶。《二十年目睹之怪現狀》第71回：「雪舫此時卻不來了，終日悶着一肚子氣，沒處好告訴，沒有好商量。」 「 悶 」還表示因氣不通暢而引起的不快之感。《素問‧風論》：「風者，善行而數變，腠理開則灑然寒，閉則熱而悶。」
From " heart" to " door" sound, the original meaning is worry and anger. "Shuowen": "Suddenly. From the heart, the door sounds." "Yi·Qian": "It is not easy to fall into the world, not to become famous, to escape from the world without boring, not to see the truth without boring. " Song" also refers to being bored. "The Strange Situation I've Witnessed in Twenty Years" Chapter 71: "Xuefang is not here at this time, and is suffocated all day long. There is nowhere to tell and no negotiation." " Stuffy" also means the unhappiness caused by the lack of air flow. "Suwen‧ Wind Theory": "The wind is good, and the number changes. The law is open to radiate cold, and the closed is hot and stuffy."

悶字的基本解释

悶
mèn

悶
mēn
均见“闷”。

悶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mèn］
［《廣韻》莫困切，去慁，明。］
同“惛2”。“闷1”的繁体字。
(1)烦忧；愤懑。
(2)指憋闷。
(3)愚昧、浑噩貌。参见“悶悶”。引申为纳闷。
(4)密闭。参见“悶子車”。
(5)方言。难道，莫非。
[②]［mēn］
［《集韻》謨奔切，平魂，明。］
“闷2”的繁体字。
(1)因气不通畅而引起的不快之感。
(2)沉默，不作声。
(3)引申为坚忍。
(4)指声音低沉不扬。参见“悶2弓兒”、“悶2雷”。
(5)用同“燜”。密闭而用微火把食物加热或煮熟。
(6)使不透气。
(7)在屋里呆着，不到外面去。

悶字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　悶； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页389第05
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫困切，音懣。【說文】懣也。【易·乾卦】遯世無悶。　又【集韻】莫奔切，音門。【老子·道德經】其政悶悶，其民淳淳。【戰國策】瘨而殫悶旄不知人。或作惛。亦作㥃。◎按古韻文元通。古人能調五言，自然叶韻。向來學者鮮知古韻，惟吳棫韻補稍能推求，故朱子本之，雖未必盡合，亦思過半矣。字彙引韻補不無小泥，而正字通駁之太過，若此處悶字原有平聲，而字彙叶明字，爲誤耳。

悶字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
悶字的起名意思

暂无。

[②] [mēn]
["Ji Yun" Mo Benqie, Ping Hun, Ming. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "沒2".
(1) The unpleasant feeling caused by the lack of air flow.
(2) Silence and silence.
(3) The extension is perseverance.
(4) Refers to the low-pitched voice. See "boring 2 bow", "boring 2 thunder".
(5) Use the same as "simmered". Heat or cook the food in an airtight manner with a low heat.
(6) Make it airtight.
(7) Stay in the house and not go outside.
